events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 30th involving rear-end collision at a traffic light.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial description and keywords provided.
Agent Jessica Thompson has been assigned to handle the customer's vehicle collision claim efficiently.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and providing next steps.
Requested the customer to submit police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of the driver’s license.
Customer uploaded all requested documents, including detailed accident photos and official police report.
Investigation team has begun reviewing submitted documents and inspecting vehicle damage for claim validation.
The accident investigation finished, confirming that the collision was not the fault of the claimant.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs has been proposed to the customer for approval.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling.
The claim was officially approved based on the investigation and customer acceptance of settlement terms.
Payment for the approved auto accident claim has been issued directly to the customer’s bank account.
The claim has been closed successfully following full payment and resolution of the vehicle damage claim.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived in the system for future reference if needed.
